item.description:
Hello,

We just spoke with B from the Boston Meetup Group. We plan to get together at 7pm on August 8th at Truly Jorg's (a cafe) to discuss and brainstorm ideas and ways to help Eric and Steve who lost everything in the Bernat Mill fire.

I am personally inviting you to join us for this brainstorming session. We will then attend the Boston Meetup Meeting at 8Pm at NESOP across the street. I will also be discussing it there...

We welcome your comments and suggestions before hand if you are unable to attend these meetings but would like to help.

See you then,

Donna and Scott

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Fundraiser Brainstorm for Eric and Steve
